quest.name: Gone Fishing
journal: Sentei has more work if you are willing.
objectives: Obtain a tasty trout from Sentei's net.
Deliver firewood and a tasty trout to Kohagi.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: Hello again, kind traveler. If you are up to it, there is something else I would like to ask of you.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: I need the firewood you see behind me delivered to my wife, Kohagi, in Namai.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: I also need you to check if the net I placed in the nearby stream caught any fish. If it did, pray take the spoils to Kohagi as well.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: Please deliver this firewood and any fish my net may have caught to my wife in Namai.

dialogue.name: KOHAGI
dialogue.text: Oh, hello there. Have we met before?

dialogue.name: KOHAGI
dialogue.text: Ah, my husband asked you to bring me these? Thank you for your kindness.

dialogue.name: KOHAGI
dialogue.text: I shall exchange the firewood and trout for rice. Our family does not own a paddy, so we put rice on our table by trading with those in Namai who do.

dialogue.name: KOHAGI
dialogue.text: We must be thankful for the spring water that flows from the heart of the Gensui Chain. Without the life it sustains, we would have nothing to trade, and no way of feeding ourselves.
